::Prowl/Kluster/Grimmler/Proto/Firearm::

Kluster nods at Iron Raptor's orders, looking around at his damaged 
team. There was little doubt that Proto would fall in this battle, 
probably Grimmler as well, them being the two most damaged.

"Allright. I'll go with Grimmler. Firearm and Proto will be the 
second team. I guess you and Prowl'll be together."

He looks at Iron Raptor for a long second and then slides a panel 
away on his head, edjecting a disk. He hands it to Iron Raptor, "In 
case I don't make it through this battle, that disk has everything I 
know about the Cybertronian Fire, which is everything. You now have 
the codes and everything."

He glances out at the battle. "Try to be careful. The Maximals need 
you."

Kluster jogs off toward the battle, taking out his missile launcher 
and cursing Angel Prime's existence. Because of one arrogant bot who 
couldn't accept peaceful terms, many Maximals would now die. Proto 
follows behind Kluster, taking out a rifle and knowing that he was 
marching to certain doom as he limps after his commander.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler and Firearm look at each other, nodding. They set off toward 
the battle, each arming their weapons.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl walks up to Iron Raptor, looking sadly after the departing 
Maximals. -That's what'll save us,- he says, -Maximal devotion. They 
know they probably won't live through this.-

He hugs and kisses her. -Just in case we don't make it, I want you to 
know that I'll always love you.-

And with that, Prowl once again takes out his staff, feeling the 
energy surge through his fingers as he takes hold of it. -Let's use 
our link to our advantage. We can relay to each other everything we 
see. Deal?-




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor watches as Angel Prime and his small group of 
followers are 
> fired upon by the Alliance, watching with cold eyes as charges head 
towards 
> the Maximals which had chosen to ignore her.
> In one pert of her mind she thought that it served them right, they 
would 
> have been safe if they had listened. Thinking that maybe they would 
learn a 
> lesson by this, if they lived through it.
> But Iron Raptor knew something that some of the bots already did or 
might 
> not know.
> If they stayed here only a small amout of their forces would be 
mowed down, 
> but if they fought too then the Alliance would fire back and the 
war would 
> be on again.
> Chordate, she knew, wasn't going to be saved. But the Maximals 
being fired 
> upon had the chance to be. Plus...the captives in the ship could be 
used to 
> ease the force of the battle and maybe think twice.
> But the captive idea wasn't going to be used.
> Iron Raptor looked at Prowl as ke spoke, then looking at the 
remainder of 
> the Maximals behind her.
> There were all edgy and itchy to fight, ready to come to the 
defence of 
> their comrads. And even though Angel Prime was the last person she 
wanted to 
> save right there and then, she couln't leave the Maximals out there 
either.
> She sighed and nodded.*
> 
> " We'll help him."
> 
> * Iron Raptor then looked at the rest of the Maximals, still not 
sure if 
> what she was doing was right. She could be sending a lot of 
Maximals to 
> their deaths by doing this. But since when did Maximals leave 
comrads 
> without a hope?*
> 
> " We're moving out. Charge yourselves and pick someone to join with 
you on 
> the field. No point in getting picked off once we're out there. 
Goota have 
> someone watching your back."
> 
> * She took the sword and slashed the blade out towards the battle.*
> 
> " They're out there slaughtering our own kind! I don't know about 
all of you 
> but I'm not about to let them get away with it!"
> 
> * Her expression became hard.*
> 
> " Firing in pairs will increase our chance to defeat them. Picking 
them off 
> one by one, one pair putting all of their firepower into one bot 
until it 
> either backs off or falls. Then moving onto the next. It might take 
a while 
> but if we work together it'll pay off. The gustalt bots are our 
first 
> targets, especially the ones which make up the legs. Without legs 
they can't 
> move."
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked over the Maximals.*
> 
> " Now how many of you want to go out there and show those slags 
what defeat 
> feels like?!"
> 
> * She then turned back towards the battle and took a step towards 
it.*
> 
> " Let's go!"
